snippet: A cameraman covering the constitutional referendum in Egypt for The Associated Press was arrested on Wednesday while transmitting live video from a polling place in Cairo.
abstract: A cameraman covering the constitutional referendum in Egypt for The Associated Press was arrested on Wednesday while transmitting live video from a polling place in Cairo.

headline.main: A.P. Cameraman Detained in Egypt After His Images Appear on Al Jazeera

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
